Published June 13, 2023 | Version 1.1
Journal article Open

The Global Human Day

Creators

  • Fajzel, William1
  • Galbraith, Eric D.1
  • Barrington-Leigh, Christopher2
  • Charmes, Jacques3
  • Frie, Elena1
  • Hatton, Ian1

  • 1. Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada
  • 2. Institute for Health and Social Policy, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada
  • 3. Centre for Population and Development, Institute of Research for Development, University of Paris, France
  • 4. LMD-IPSL, Ecole Normale Supérieure (ENS-Ulm), Paris, France
  • 5. Department of Plant and Environmental Sciences, Weizmann Institute of Science, Rehovot, Israel
  • 6. Data Science Institute, Columbia University, New York NY, USA
  • 7. Department of Epidemiology, Biostatistics, and Occupational Health, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada

Description

This database contains the necessary data and scripts to compile results as published in The Global Human Day (2023), PNAS 120 (25). 

For more information on the project, please visit www.humanchronome.org

For more information on the group, please visit www.earthsystemdynamics.org

 

Version 1.1 change log:

- Removed macOSX journaling

- Tidied subcategory names in output files
